urls.title: Mayor makes first speech at the Future Fens Taskforce | Cambridgeshire & Peterborough Combined Authority
urls.description: Mayor Dr Nik Johnson made his first speech at the Future Fens Taskforce yesterday (19th May 2021) Hello everyone. I’m Dr Nik Johnson. People know me as Dr Nik and since May 10 the Mayor of the Combined Authority. I’m delighted to be able to join you at this Future Fens event, the first formal event […]

tweets.text: Delighted to have given my first official speech to the #FutureFensTaskforce. #Compassion #Cooperation #Community in action ‘in what is at its very heart a project of collaboration – water companies, @EnvAgency, @WaterREast with all of its partners. More: https://t.co/UgrGyy7LLW https://t.co/U4qLB4FIlr
@syonist @PensanaRE @EnvAgency https://t.co/NtCRnkQ8SV

tweets.text: In the North our water comes mostly from surface water supplies like reservoirs rather than groundwater. This means we're more reactive to dry weather. Here's #Yarrow reservoir during our drought in 2018. You can help keep our supplies resilient by saving water. #watersavingweek https://t.co/8aHdD5bYCC

@EnvAgencyMids This monitoring does not consider the impact to health in the home where wind does not clear it. Once it enters its hard to clear. Been in my house for 2 days and struggled to clear it out even with doors open (no smell outside). It IS having a short term health impact on me.
